description: Jotun, the last of his kind, sought to resurrect his people with the help of the Nether Orb of Nature - a relic that his clan believed to be the heart of their god. After journeying around Rodia for many years, he finally acquired the Nether Orb - but instead of reawakening his clan, the orb roused an insatiable bloodlust in Jotun that cannot be quenched.
name: Jotun
